mapper.select: select * from message where kind = #{kind} and acceptPart = #{partId} ORDER BY sendDate desc limit #{begin},#{end}
select * from message where kind = #{kind} ORDER BY sendDate desc limit #{begin},#{end}
select * from message where kind = #{kind} and acceptPart = #{part} and acceptGroup = #{group} ORDER BY sendDate desc limit #{begin},#{end}
select count(*) from message where kind = 4 and acceptPart = #{part}

select * from ( (select * from message where (kind = 1 or kind = 8) and acceptPerson = #{jobId}) UNION (select * from message where kind = 3) UNION (select * from message where kind = 5 and acceptPart = #{part} and acceptGroup is null) UNION (select * from message where kind = 6 and acceptGroup = #{group} and acceptPart = #{part}) )as A ORDER BY sendDate desc limit #{begin},#{end}
